categories: Category:Starships of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: White Nova was a Harrower-class dreadnought in service of the Sith Empire during the Cold War and the Galactic War that followed. It would serve as the flagship of an Imperial fleet directing an attack on a Republic Thranta-class corvette Dorin's Sky and later the Foundry against the Republic blockade guarding it.
The White Nova first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It serves as a flashpoint and operation starting area for Imperial players
